thread.title: Lauren Goodger forced to deny jailed lover Joey Morrisson will sell stolen watches from prison after setting up business
thread.title_full: Lauren Goodger forced to deny jailed lover Joey Morrisson will sell stolen watches from prison after setting up business

author: mirror
title: Lauren Goodger forced to deny jailed lover Joey Morrisson will sell stolen watches from prison after setting up business
text:
Lauren Goodger forced to deny jailed lover Joey Morrisson will sell stolen watches from prison after setting up business The TOWIE star later deleted the post after criticism from followers Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
The old adage says to stand by your man. But TOWIE's Lauren Goodger is going one better - by helping her boyfriend set up a business for his life after prison. 
The reality TV star, 30, took to Instagram on Sunday where she happily promoted Joey Morrisson's range of watches that'll be for sale once he's released from HMP Highpoint South in Newmarket, Suffolk, later this year. 
Sharing a snap of a selection of time pieces, she said: "Follow @joeymorrisson for all luxury watches at the best prices, also jewellery such as rings, chains and more. Mens and Womens Rolex, Audemars Piguet, Patek Phillipee, Cartier and more [sic]." 
The eyebrow-raising post clocked-up more than 100 likes before she deleted it after followers questioned whether the items were illegitimate -something Lauren emphatically denies. The Instagram post, which was later deleted (Photo: Laurenrosegoodger/Instagram) Read More Lauren Goodger 'in talks' for reality TV show with jailed boyfriend Joey Morrison 
Hitting back at one critics, she said: “@bigchalala @lisa.neil_ yes it is for real, is that a problem? And no they ain’t stolen what a pathetically unintelligent question to ask." 
A second post said: “@logue_david and your point is? Say more about what? Yes his in prison and has more going for himself than most people out here. So maybe keep your opinions to yourself.” 
Just a day earlier she uploaded a teaser post, which featured a picture of her criminal beau. She captioned it:"Mine @joeymorrisson as he can't put his own up ❤ follow as watches to be uploaded soon".
